casebody.data:
Milton Tyson, Jr. v. Department of Correction (9952)

Dupont, C. J., O’Connell and Heiman, Js.

Argued September 30 decision released October 22, 1991 Frank P. Cannatelli, for the appellant (plaintiff). Michael J. Lanoue, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
